title: Somehow, I'm not even surprised.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: But something tells me not to click on any link that doesn't show the Summoner name in the post description..

replies.body: With LCU happening we've had no boards dev to solve this particular problem, however now that the LCU is mostly implemented and some of the dev teams can move onto other things, we will hopefully be getting a more permanent solution than simply mass delete/banning soon TM.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=glZdQ4Qz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-24T08:38:42.178+0000)
>
> With LCU happening we've had no boards dev to solve this particular problem, however now that the LCU is mostly implemented and some of the dev teams can move onto other things, we will hopefully be getting a more permanent solution than simply mass delete/banning soon TM.

You don't need a dev to do this. Anyone with an iota of sense and the permissions to edit the forums could fix this in a split-second.

It's not a function built into the moderation API, hence the need for dev to rectify that. The API is very bare bones, so while we can mass delete and filter words and the like we do not have the means to prevent these posts at present.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=glZdQ4Qz,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-11-24T15:14:44.622+0000)
>
> It's not a function built into the moderation API, hence the need for dev to rectify that. The API is very bare bones, so while we can mass delete and filter words and the like we do not have the means to prevent these posts at present.

You misunderstand. I am not talking about moderators, I am talking about Rioters and their access into the ACP.
Nope, apparently everyone who could touch the boards is working on the LCU, that is totally logical ain't it?

I WAS WONDERING ABOUT THAT

http://i.imgur.com/UpRNGJ7.png

I took a screen shot of the boards a few hours ago, because I thought it bugged out on me.
And was like wtf is this shit?
Yeah, and yet that has been happening for weeks constantly, and yet isn't stopped yet.
